edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.core
Class Event

java.lang.Object
  edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.core.Event
Direct Known Subclasses:
LocationChangedEvent, PhoneIsFallingEvent, PhoneRingingEvent, SMSReceivedEvent
public abstract class Event
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates a generic event. It wraps the android.content.Intent that triggered this event and provides access to any attribute data associated with it. Event should be overridden by a class that describes the actual event and provides access to its specific data attributes. TODO(londinop): Add event logging support

Field Summary
protected  Intent intent
          Stores the intent that triggered this event, which contains data associated with it
